context_bundle.summary: Prometheus is an open-source monitoring system with a dimensional data model, flexible query language, and efficient time series storage

onboarding.quick_start: helm install prometheus prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack --namespace monitoring --create-namespace && kubectl get svc -n monitoring
common_patterns: Scrape config: ServiceMonitor with selector.matchLabels and endpoints definition
Alerting: PrometheusRule with groups and alert expressions with 'for: 5m' duration
Remote write: remote_write config in prometheus.yml with url and auth credentials
Service discovery: 'kubectl get servicemonitors -n monitoring' to verify scrape targets
known_errors: Scrape targets down: 'kubectl get endpoints -n monitoring' and verify ServiceMonitor selectors match pod labels
Memory high: 'kubectl exec -n monitoring prometheus-0 -- promtool tsdb list' and adjust storage.tsdb.retention.time
Alert firing incorrectly: 'curl http://prometheus:9090/api/v1/rules' and check alerting rules syntax

Helm chart conflicts: 'helm uninstall prometheus -n monitoring && helm install prometheus prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack -n monitoring --set prometheus.prometheusSpec.storageSpec.volumeClaimTemplate.spec.resources.requests.storage=50Gi'
Remote write failed: 'kubectl logs -n monitoring prometheus-0 | grep remote_write' and verify authentication credentials
